arts.ttl: Romelu Lukaku Credits Galatasaray Ace for Guiding His Move to Napoli
arts.sum: Former Inter and Roma striker Romelu Lukaku has returned to Serie A to reunite with his favorite head coach, Antonio Conte, at Napoli. The Belgium international has enjoyed a bright start to life at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona, tallying two goals and three assists in his first five appearances for the Partenopei. The post Romelu Lukaku Credits Galatasaray Ace for Guiding His Move to Napoli appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Pesadilla para el Galatasaray en Letonia
arts.sum: Los de Okan Buruk ganaban por 2-0 en el minuto 38 y acabaron empate ante un equipo valorado con el mismo precio que Dávinson Sánchez.

arts.ttl: RFS vs Galatasaray – Osimhen Out Injured
arts.sum: Galatasaray will face RFS in their second Europa League group stage match on October 3rd. Fresh off a 3-1 win over PAOK, Galatasaray enters the match with high hopes. arts.ttl: Victor Osimhen Reveals Who Convinced Him to Join Galatasaray
arts.sum: Nigerian striker Victor Osimhen has revealed the key role Galatasaray manager Okan Buruk played in convincing him to join the Turkish club on loan from Napoli. arts.ttl: Chelsea and PSG Summer Target Questions Why Clubs Hesitated to Pay His True Worth
arts.sum: Victor Osimhen broke his silence over the failed permanent transfer that didn’t happen this past summer window. The Nigerian was linked to Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain until the final week. Nonetheless, neither pulled the trigger on a deal to secure him from Napoli.
